getFieldID_Input().Description: Get a FieldID for the input field of this intrinsic.

Parameters: Allocation: Output allocation. Must match creation element type.
forEach(android.renderscript.Allocation).Description: Apply the filter to the input and save to the specified allocation.

setInput(android.renderscript.Allocation.Description: Set the input of the 3x3 convolve. Must match the element type supplied during create.

Parameters: float: The array of coefficients to set
setCoefficients(float[]).Description: Set the coefficients for the convolve. The convolve layout is: [ 0, 1, 2 ] [ 3, 4, 5 ] [ 6, 7, 8 ]

Parameters: Allocation: Output allocation. Must match creation element type.
forEach(android.renderscript.Allocation,.Description: Apply the filter to the input and save to the specified allocation.
forEach(android.renderscript.Allocation,.FullName: public void forEach (Allocation aout, Script.LaunchOptions opt)

getKernelID().Description: Get a KernelID for this intrinsic kernel.

Parameters: Element: Element type for intputs and outputs
create(android.renderscript.RenderScript.Description: Supported elements types are @B_android#renderscript#Element#U8_E@, @B_android#renderscript#Element#U8_2_E@, @B_android#renderscript#Element#U8_3_E@, @B_android#renderscript#Element#U8_4_E@, @B_android#renderscript#Element#F32_E@, @B_android#renderscript#Element#F32_2_E@, @B_android#renderscript#Element#F32_3_E@, and @B_android#renderscript#Element#F32_4_E@. The default coefficients are: [ 0, 0, 0 ] [ 0, 1, 0 ] [ 0, 0, 0 ]
create(android.renderscript.RenderScript.FullName: public static ScriptIntrinsicConvolve3x3 create (RenderScript rs, Element e)

ClassDesc: Intrinsic for applying a 3x3 convolve to an allocation. * @apiSince 17
